name: Ex Animo
description:
Ex Animo is a 3D isometric action-boss rush game, single-player, where the player faces his own emotions materialized in giant bosses!

Sef was an arrogant and proud King, who had his kingdom destroyed after subduing and underestimating the power of other kingdoms. When he loses everything, his mind collapses, taking him to an unknown world in which he loses his memory and his own emotions. Now wandering around this world, he searches for answers, facing giant creatures that represent his own lost emotions, which will remind him of his mistakes.

Game Control:

Keyboard

W/A/S/D - Movement
Space - Evade / Sprint
K - Attack

Gamepad

Left Stick - Movement
X (South Button) - Evade / Sprint
Square (West Button) - Attack

Game Developers

Arthur Lorando - 3D Environment Artist / Level Design
Paulo Henrique Bragança - Game Developer / Sound Design (FMOD)
Raí Esteves - 3D Character Artist / 3D Animator
Reinaldo Di Pietro - 3D Character Artist
